column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Amazing!! From start to finish simply amazing! Paz was our server and she was great and very attentive. I can't say enough about their octopus and squid
column2: simply stellar!!! This was the most tender and perfectly done octopus I have ever eaten
column5: and red sangria were also so flavorful and worth it. Make sure you ask for your paella to come with the crust because that's where allll the flavor is!
